name: The Sim Supermarket Mobile
description:
My supermarket is opened！

To become rich overnight is a miracle we often dream about, 《My sim Supermarket》 is the means by which this dream can be realized.

Your supermarket is opened.

There are all kinds of goods in the supermarket.

When you manage the supermarket, you may meet a lot of different customers every day.

You can still come across a superstar.
